title: Stuck in Gold 3. What do I do now
body: After basically walking through Silver 2-Gold (Skipped gold 4), I am now in a slump on ranked to where I can't even play my main role to carry anymore. I love supporting, and it was a fun ride up to this point. I feel like I have to 2 solo carry with an assassin.  Trust me when I say that I am buttcheecks at this game, but I dont wanna give up even when I say I do.
